attributes.action: Bring Back ; ON THE BUSES MOVIES.
attributes.additional_details: The remaking of on the buses movies would simply bring happiness and joy to millions.
attributes.background: On the buses was a great british comedy classic. It is high time such movies were remade and put back on cinema screens and television.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for producing television or movies.
